channel.title: Starting A Server
channel.description: hi ive downloaded Testscape and Hamachi but what do i do now?

item.title: Starting A Server
item.dc:creator: @warmwaddle warmwaddle
item.description:
@warmwaddle wrote:

Well, you need WinRar which i dont remember where to download. After you install that, right click testscape and click “extract here”. Then click the new testscape folder it makes, open it and all the different files are laid out for you…if you wanna go straight into hosting, make a network on hamachi, then just simply go to the extracted testscape and double-click runserver.bat…then open your client, and get on server 127.0.0.1 and you’ll be on your own server.

Read full topic
